job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout NetAppstrongnbspppNetAppnbspis a Fortune 500 company that believes in the transformative power of data  to expand customer touchpoints to foster greater innovation and to optimize operations We are designed for simplicity focused on data protection and open to enriching customer solutions for on premise andor cloud environments Weve built a Data Fabric for a datadriven world  to simplify and integrate data management across the resources that are best for the business We bring enterprisegrade data services customers rely on into the cloud and the simple flexibility of cloud into the data center And we do it with industryleading solutions that work across diverse environments and the worlds biggest hyperscale cloud providersnbspppnbspppAt NetApp we fully embrace and advance a diverse inclusive workforce with a culture of belonging that enables our employees to bring their whole selves to do their lifes best worknbspppnbspppstrongWho do we look for strongnbspppAre you a continuous learner who wants to join an empowered team of forwardthinking smart dedicated technologists that approaches every problem with fresh eyes If you answered yes you may be who NetApp is looking fornbspppWe recognize that not everyone fits neatly into any checklist but below are some of the skills and experience we think will help make you successful in this role If you dont match everything on this list but are excited about the opportunity and think you could contribute wed love to hear from younbspppnbspppstrongJob DescriptionstrongnbsppulliParticipate in product design development verification troubleshooting and delivery of a system or major subsystemsnbspliliCollaborate with team members on designing and implementing software with a focus on simplicity reliability and manageability using CnbspliliWrite unit and automated integration testsnbspliliParticipate in technical discussions within the team and with other groups within the Business UnitnbspliliReceive guidance and mentoring on assigned tasks from senior engineers managers and technical teamnbspliliParticipate in virtual and cloud environmentsnbspliliContributenbspinnbspthe area of certificates encryption key management or other security related areasnbspliulpstrongJob RequirementsstrongnbsppulliExperience with multiple programming languages is a plusnbspliliProficiency in C C andor PythonnbspliliExperience with LinuxFreeBSD developmentnbspliliUnderstanding of multithreaded amp multi process environmentsnbspliliFamiliarity with TCPIP protocols and networking applications developmentnbspliliPossess exceptional written and verbal communication skillsnbspliliStrong aptitude for learning new technologiesnbspliliAbility to work on a diverse teamnbspliulpstrongEducation and ExperiencestrongnbsppulliLess than 3 years of software development experiencenbspliliA Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science or equivalentnbspDecember 2021 graduates encouraged to applyliliPassion for writing and testing high quality codenbspliliBroad knowledge of computer science fundamentalsnbspliliProjects professional experience or coursework related to operating systems computer architecture multithreading data structures amp algorithmsnbspliulpnbspppemAt NetApp we fully embrace and advance a diverse inclusive global workforce with a culture of belonging that leverages the backgrounds and perspectives of all employees customers partners and communities to foster a higher performing organization  George Kurian CEOemnbspppnbspp
